body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jonathan Jackson and the customer's name is Kathleen Parker.  The conversation is about Accounting Eagles (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Jonathan Jackson, and I am with Accounting Eagles. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Jonathan, I'm Kathleen Parker. I'm calling because I'm confused about my latest bill.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Kathleen. I would be happy to help you with that. Could you please confirm your account number for me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my account number is one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. To further assist you, could you please provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my date of birth is April twentieth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! I have all the details I need. Let’s take a look at your billing statement together.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that. I'm just feeling a bit frustrated that there are unexpected charges.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Kathleen. It can be quite frustrating to see surprises on a bill. Let me explain the charges to you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Jonathan. I really want to resolve this.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! I will walk you through it step by step. Thank you for your patience, Kathleen. I appreciate your time today!
